newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $2.3 bln for next week.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $2.3 bln for next week.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for the week of April 14 are expected to total $2.3 billion in 125 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $1.8 billion in 44 sales, with a $197 million Metropolitian Tranisit Authority, N.Y., deal through Bear, Stearns & Co. Inc. topping the list.
On the competitive side, 81 sales totaling $574 million are on the schedule. A $70 million Clark County, Nev., deal on Tuesday is the largest.
An additional eight sales totaling $570 million are on the possible calender, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds next week, depending on market conditions.
